takes.text: And we will name it… JavaScript!
takes.author: Sun

takes.text: Anything can be an adult diaper if you have confidence.
takes.author: Matthieu

takes.text: Carbonated contact lenses
takes.author: A. Schmoe

takes.text: Corsets for horses
takes.author: A. Schmoe

takes.text: Homestar Runner dot com is the Illiad of the 21st century.
takes.author: A. Schmoe

takes.text: If climate change is real, why are my extremities rapidly cooling?
takes.author: A. Schmoe

takes.text: If everybody rode public transit, how would they learn to drive?
takes.author: A. Schmoe

takes.text: If I, a relatively boring person, am excited about this subject, all the normal people will be desperate to hear about it!
takes.author: A. Schmoe

takes.text: It’s 1790 and If there’s one thing we don’t need here in the United States, it’s that newfangled metric system France just proposed.
takes.author: USA

takes.text: It’s 1866 and if there’s one thing we don’t need here in the United States, it’s to make the metric system mandatory in this new Metric Act of 1866 we just passed.
takes.author: USA

takes.text: It’s 1902 and if there’s one thing we don’t need here in the United States, it’s that metric system our congressional committee of scientists just begged us to pass.
takes.author: USA

takes.text: It’s 1975 and if there’s one thing we don’t need here in the United States, it’s to give meaningful power to the Metric Conversion Act of 1975 we just passed.
takes.author: USA

takes.text: Mouth rats
takes.author: Matthieu

takes.text: Now that we’ve inbred wolves until they fit down rabbit holes, I’m confident we’ll draw the line here.
takes.author: A. Schmoe

takes.text: Obama should compromise more with Republicans now that Democrats have a supermajority in Congress.
takes.author: Republicans

takes.text: Poor people should just work harder
takes.author: Jerks

takes.text: Sure, bring it inside the city gates-- never look a gift horse in the mouth!
takes.author: Paris of Troy

takes.text: The real problem with Marvel movies is that there aren’t enough sympathetic millionaires.
takes.author: A. Schmoe

takes.text: There’s no rule that says a dog can’t be an anesthesiologist
takes.author: A. Schmoe

takes.text: We should collectively pool funds against medical expenses, which can only be accessed if you’re employed by a private entity.
takes.author: A. Schmoe

takes.text: WiFi is the chicken soup of the wireless spectrum.
takes.author: A. Schmoe

takes.text: Yeah, just keep scratching it until it feels better.
takes.author: A. Schmoe
